[spoiler]basically these 2 trolls, meena peixes and vriska serket have a plan to defeat this huge boss called lord english, but both have different plans.

so they decided to see who should apply which plan first with a battle, which then became a battle royal formed by all the trolls that are either dead or from doomed timelines (sinec this battle takes place in the afterlife), which then became a clusterfuck[/spoiler]

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546608e363687245d7af0100#post_546608e363687245d7af0100
"The love doctor is in"?
"To boldly bang where nobody has banged before"?
"Love is in the air.  No not the heartbreak!  They're in my eyes!  They're in my eyes!  AAAAAHHHHH!"
"How, in the name of Zeus’s butthole, did you get over your heartbreak?"
"Release the bae!"
“I love pressure. I eat it for breakfast.”
 “It’s like we’re on two different channels now. I’m CNN and she’s the Home Shopping Network.”
